patient.lastNRecords: select patient_id from patient where patient_id > ? order by patient_id asc limit ?
patient.firstRecord: select patient_id from patient order by patient_id asc limit 1
patient.existQuery: select count(*) from patient where patient_id = ?
patient.findIdByUuid: select person_id from person where uuid = ?

encounter.lastNRecords: select encounter_id from encounter where encounter_id > ? order by id asc limit ?
encounter.existQuery: select count(*) from encounter where encounter_id = ?
encounter.findIdByUuid: select encounter_id from encounter where uuid = ?
